backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing implemented marketing site features, theme, and asset usage.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short summaries of all frontend component files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the root div and main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React app rendering navbar, main sections, roadmap, FAQ, and footer within a dark theme.
frontend/src/components/FAQAccordion.tsx: FAQ section rendering 8 accordion items using Radix UI components.
Responsive navbar with logo, desktop links, mobile menu, and smooth-scroll navigation.
Roadmap section displaying quarterly milestones with icons, badges, and feature lists.
frontend/src/components/Sections.tsx: Hero, Features, How It Works, and Footer components with images, icons, cards, and CTA buttons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor using React Query, updating it when the user's Internet Identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future React Query hooks; currently contains no logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS base styles, theme variables, typography, layout utilities, and dark mode rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders the root component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, typography, and plugins for styling the frontend.
project_state.json: Stores metadata about the project, including goals, features, assets requirements, and project status.
